title: Looking to build casual ranked team Silver~Gold+
body:
Already have two memebers including myself, looking to build a casual ranked team.
We will set one night **at least** per week to play ranked team together.

My IGN is Arrabbiata

Please post if interested:
* IGN
* Rank
* Favored position
* Champion pool

replies.body:
hey, i am interested
plat 5
ign - Zepea
i can play any position but my support is silver standard
edit - top lane my favourite

hi i'm interested
Silver 5
OnMaccasWIFI
Top/mid/jungle

Hey there,

I have ran a team before so i do have some experience, we only got to S1  but we were skipping every other div. soloq i dropped from s4 down to b2 but climbing back now

https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=xaerox

IGN: xAerOx

I play ADC, best champ is Jinx {{champion:222}} by far, next would be Siv and Kali. but with can play all adcs

Hey, I'm interested in this. I do have another ranked team with my friends, but we don't play ranked often (as a team) I've only recently climbed to Silver V in solo que, so I'm not the best player out there. 

IGN: Nyeseth

I can really play anywhere you need me to (my worst lane is probably jungle, I'm a decent Rammus though).
Top - Comfortable as Gnar
Mid - Comfortable as Malzahar, Vel'Koz and Xerath
Jungle - Comfortable as Rammus, Vi and Diana (although Diana is proabably not my most preferred jungler)
ADC - Comfortable as Jinx, Caitlyn and Ashe
Support - Comfortable as Leona, Blitz, Soraka and Nami 

At the moment I'm working on learning Fiora and Vayne.
